title: I Need A Developer & Designer For A Job Board SIte.
snippet: I want users to be able to create a basic profile kind of like "linked in" that highlights their resume, i need the employers to be able to create an account and choose package deals to post their jobs on the site(request sponsored listings), users to upload resumes and cover letters to be extracted into our own set resume format just to begin. The design aspect i want to be very simplistic but unique.
